U can try to restart the chapter, i have a similar issue  at chapter 13, fucking quick time events.
I read on the web about my issue and that was the only workaround. Making my way again on chapter 13...

I got bored right away repeating the  chapter, so i tried the same workaround  that worked on dead space 2 quick events, i just lower  the graphs to low  and i passed chapter 13, u should try on ur event.
I hate console ports...
